title: Teemo's teacher?
body: So everyone knows teemo, commonly referred to as satan or perhaps cancer. Teemo is a scout and i was thinking the other day, all scouts have like a "scout leader" or like a grandmaster or something like that to teach them. So if teemo is as cancer as he is I WANT TO MEET HIS SCOUTMASTER I MEAN WHAT THE HELL COULD HE DO??? XD idek

replies.body: Someone has to be the first scout. The first scout can't have a scout master

Star Wars is dumb.
How about is (was) Ip Man more powerful than Bruce Lee?

Why does the teacher have to be more powerful than the student?

Is Obi-Wan more powerful than Darth Vader? 
I think not.
